long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple bookmarking on X (formerly Twitter).

With Easy X / Twitter Bookmark Folder, saving tweets into organized folders is quicker.

Just hover over the bookmark icon on any tweet, and your bookmark folders will automatically pop up.

Click on your folder and your tweet will be bookmarked in that specific folder!
